challengeName: CSFV Gaming API - BlackList API Update
detailedRequirements:
TCO Points : The winner will get rewarded a 30 pts via Jira Races Competition Ticket.

 

Asking questions in the forums are improtant for the success of this challenge, as copilot has familiarity with the deployment and will help you with any details needed.

 

Project Overview

This project, the CSFV Community Gaming website project will provide the web site infrastructure and integration of the games. This will be a web site that is available on the Internet, and also will be delivered in a form where the server and the games can be installed and used behind a firewall.

The goal of this challenge to make an update to Blacklist API in the CSFV Gaming API Module, and improve documentation.

Competition Task Overview

The following are required in this challenge :

  • Merge Create/Update blacklist API in single API, if playerId exists then update it, otherwise create it
    • Properties should not be completely replaced in update, it should update existing key/values or add to it.
  • BlackLists shows a response including mongodb fields (__v and _id) we don't need these so remove it.
  • Add separate endpoints to add/update/remove properties directly of existing playerId.
    • The add/update/delete should be by proeprty Key.
    • Disallow multiple key/value pairs of the same Key.
  • Search API
    • Add option to allow doing ORing or ANDing of the passed in parameters.
  • Documentation should be updated accordingly, it is Gaming_API-ALPHARelease.doc
    • properties are optional but it is mentioned as required in the document
    • Request table are mentioned as response table
    • Fix grammer errors

Github Code

The gaming api can be found in http://github.com/topcoderinc/csfv_gaming_api_module

If you get 404 error page then you don't have access, request it in the challenge forums.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Submission Deliverables

Below is an overview of the deliverables:

  • Patch file of the changes.
  • Updated API documentation - the document is Gaming_API-ALPHARelease.doc

Final Submission

For each member, the final submission should be uploaded to the Online Review Tool.
